DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to determine if: the large muscles of the leg, activated during walking, are also active during scooting; whether scooting alters the relationship between leg and breathing heaviness; whether there is evidence of leg fatigue during scooting.
DOC.brief_title: Muscle Activity and Sensation During Upright Partitioned Leg Exercise in COPD
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of COPD: FEV1 < 80 % and FEV1/FVC < 0.7; Able to communicate in English Clinically stable predominant comorbidities or treatments that might influence the results of exercise testing
